lines.text:
[after being mistakenly thrown by Halliday]
Maxine, did he hurt you?

[lying with her skirt pulled up on the couch]
I don't think so, but my dignity's in awful shape!

[obviously liking what he sees]
It looks fine from here.
Are you in the habit of wandering around strange men's apartments?
Mr. Moto is not strange. We're friends.
It's a habit you ought to break. You could lose either your health or your honor.

[in the darkness]
Afraid, Engle? Is fear turning your legs to milk?
